#sidebar Sidebar

== _class_ !CssConvertLevel3PropertiesMinifierFilter _extends_ [ApiMinifierFiltersACssMinifierFilter aCssMinifierFilter] ==
This [ApiMinifierFiltersACssMinifierFilter minifier filter] will trigger on most CSS Level 3 properties (and some browser 
specific ones) and add other browser specific declaration properties.
----

=== Properties ===
==== _protected_ `array` [ApiMinifierFiltersACssMinifierFilter#Properties aCssMinifierFilter::$configuration] = array() ====
The filter configuration.
----

==== _protected_ [ApiMinifierFiltersACssMinifierFilter#Properties aCssMinifierFilter::$minifier] = `null` ====
Instance of the [ApiMinifierCssMinifier CssMinifier] of the filter.
----
	
=== Methods ===
==== `void` _public_ [ApiMinifierFiltersACssMinifierFilter#Methods aCssMinifierFilter::__construct]([ApiMinifierCssMinifier CssMinifier] $minifier, `array` $configuration = array()) ====
Constructor setting the instance of [ApiMinifierCssMinifier CssMinifier] and the plugin configuration.
 * [ApiMinifierCssMinifier CssMinifier] $minifier : Instance of [ApiMinifierCssMinifier CssMinifier]
 * `array` $configuration : Filter configuration [optional]
 * *Returns:* `void`
----

==== `integer` _public_ apply(`array` &$tokens) ====
Implements [ApiMinifierFiltersACssMinifierFilter#Methods aCssMinifierFilter::apply].

Apply the filter logic on the array of [ApiTokensACssToken tokens]. Returns the amount of added [ApiTokensACssToken tokens]
or 0 if no matching declaration property was found.
 * `array` &$tokens : Array of [ApiTokensACssToken tokens]
 * *Returns:* `integer` Amount of added, changed or removed tokens; a return value large than 0 will rebuild the array
----
